title: Setting: Message/call voice notifications, Read caller info, and message out loud.
content:
My prev. phone (Android 7.0) had a Sound Setting to read caller info and message out loud.  Is that feature no longer allowed, or not allowed with Pixel 4a.  I believe I saw something somewhere indicating Alexa could be used for this purpose???? Not sure.
I'd appreciate any help/advice you can offer.
Regards,
Minuend
